org.apache.flink.api.common.serialization

类 AbstractDeserializationSchema<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.serialization.AbstractDeserializationSchema<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type created by the deserialization schema.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, DeserializationSchema<T>, ResultTypeQueryable<T>
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractDeserializationSchema, AvroRowDeserializationSchema, JSONDeserializationSchema

    @PublicEvolving
public abstract class AbstractDeserializationSchema<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeserializationSchema<T>
    The deserialization schema describes how to turn the byte messages delivered by certain data sources (for example Apache Kafka) into data types (Java/Scala objects) that are processed by Flink.

    This base variant of the deserialization schema produces the type information automatically by extracting it from the generic class arguments.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • deserialize

        public abstract T deserialize(byte[] message)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        De-serializes the byte message.
        指定者:
        deserialize 在接口中 DeserializationSchema<T>
        参数:
        message - The message, as a byte array.
        返回:
        The de-serialized message as an object.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • isEndOfStream

        public boolean isEndOfStream(T nextElement)
        Method to decide whether the element signals the end of the stream. If true is returned the element won't be emitted.

        This default implementation returns always false, meaning the stream is interpreted to be unbounded.

        指定者:
        isEndOfStream 在接口中 DeserializationSchema<T>
        参数:
        nextElement - The element to test for the end-of-stream signal.
        返回:
        True, if the element signals end of stream, false otherwise.

      • getProducedType

        public TypeInformation<T> getProducedType()
        从接口复制的说明: ResultTypeQueryable
        Gets the data type (as a TypeInformation) produced by this function or input format.
        指定者:
        getProducedType 在接口中 ResultTypeQueryable<T>
        返回:
        The data type produced by this function or input format.
